text: Neuzheli te, kotoryye ne uverovali, poteryali razum do takoy stepeni, chto nadumali vzyat' rabov Moikh angelov i Isu (Iisusa) vmesto Menya bogami, kotoryye yakoby okazyvayut im pomoshch' i otvrashchayut ot nikh vred. My ugotovili ad prebyvaniyem dlya neveruyushchikh, gde oni podvergnutsya tomu nakazaniyu, kotoroye oni zasluzhivayut
